bio: Nick Walker is a British street artist who is known for his distinctive, stencil-based artworks. He has been active in the street art scene since the late 1980s, and is considered one of the pioneers of the movement. Walker's work often incorporates elements of popular culture, politics, and social commentary, and is characterized by his use of bold, graphic designs and bright, vibrant colors. He has completed numerous public art projects and murals around the world, and his work has been exhibited in galleries and museums worldwide. Walker is highly regarded within the street art community, and his work has had a significant impact on the genre.
